text: Désaignes is a village and commune in the Ardèche département in the southern part of France. The commune has a population of 1,105 people as of the year 1999.http://www.insee.fr/fr/recensement/nouv_recens/resultats/repartition/comd07.htm?numdep=07&x;=39&y;=7 List of populations and communes of the Ardeche department. ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ardèche department ==References== Category:Communes in Ardèche
title: Désaignes
